pilot:Pilot_Sprint.NAME: Sprint
pilot:Pilot_Sprint.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL Gain !pilot:UrMagic! pilot:Momentum. NL Exhaust.

pilot:Titanfall.NAME: Titanfall
pilot:Titanfall.DESCRIPTION: Deploy Titan with !M! pilot:Shields. Gain !pilot:UrMagic! pilot:Protect. NL Add *Chaingun to your draw pile.
pilot:Titanfall.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deploy Titan with !M! pilot:Shields. Gain !pilot:UrMagic! pilot:Protect. NL Add *Chaingun to your draw pile.

pilot:Chaingun.NAME: X016A2 Chaingun
pilot:Chaingun.DESCRIPTION: pilot:Armament. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! pilot:Protect.

pilot:Kick.NAME: Kick
pilot:Kick.DESCRIPTION: pilot:Reflex. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card.

pilot:Mozambique.NAME: Mozambique
pilot:Mozambique.DESCRIPTION: Reflex. NL Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Vulnerable.

pilot:Flatline.NAME: Flatline
pilot:Flatline.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak to a random enemy twice.

pilot:EVA8.NAME: EVA-8
pilot:EVA8.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL pilot:Engage: deal !D! damage to ALL enemies instead.

pilot:DoubleTake.NAME: Double Take
pilot:DoubleTake.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have pilot:Advantage, gain [E] .

pilot:Volt.NAME: Volt
pilot:Volt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have pilot:Momentum, gain [E] .

pilot:G2A5.NAME: G2A5
pilot:G2A5.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have pilot:Advantage, gain !M! pilot:Momentum.

pilot:Alternator.NAME: Alternator
pilot:Alternator.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy twice. pilot:Momentum increases this damage.

pilot:CAR.NAME: CAR
pilot:CAR.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. pilot:Momentum increases this damage.

pilot:BatteryBackUp.NAME: Battery Back-up
pilot:BatteryBackUp.DESCRIPTION: Give your Titan !M! pilot:Shields. NL Exhaust.
pilot:BatteryBackUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Give your Titan !M! pilot:Shields. NL Exhaust.

pilot:WallHang.NAME: Wall Hang
pilot:WallHang.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you do not have pilot:Advantage, lose !M! Dexterity.

pilot:Pilot_Dash.NAME: Dash
pilot:Pilot_Dash.DESCRIPTION: pilot:Armament. pilot:Reflex. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! pilot:Momentum.

pilot:BunnyHop.NAME: Bunny Hop
pilot:BunnyHop.DESCRIPTION: pilot:Reflex. NL Gain !M! pilot:Momentum. NL If you have pilot:Advantage, gain [E] . NL Exhaust.
pilot:BunnyHop.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: pilot:Reflex. NL Gain !M! pilot:Momentum and draw a card. NL If you have pilot:Advantage, gain [E] . NL Exhaust.

pilot:Strider.NAME: Strider
pilot:Strider.DESCRIPTION: pilot:Deploy: Give your Titan !M! pilot:Shields. NL Shuffle !pilot:MetaMagic! *Dash into your draw pile.
pilot:Strider.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: pilot:Deploy: Give your Titan !M! pilot:Shields. NL Shuffle !pilot:MetaMagic! *Dash+ into your draw pile.

pilot:Leadwall.NAME: Leadwall
pilot:Leadwall.DESCRIPTION: pilot:Armament. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If you are engaging, gain !B! Block and !M! pilot:Momentum.

pilot:PhaseDash.NAME: Phase Dash
pilot:PhaseDash.DESCRIPTION: pilot:Armament. NL pilot:Reflex. NL Gain !M! Intangible. NL Discard !pilot:MetaMagic! cards.
pilot:PhaseDash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: pilot:Armament. NL pilot:Reflex. NL Gain !M! Intangible. NL Discard !pilot:MetaMagic! card.

pilot:Ronin.NAME: Ronin
pilot:Ronin.DESCRIPTION: pilot:Deploy: Give your Titan !M! pilot:Shields. NL Shuffle !pilot:MetaMagic! *Leadwall and !pilot:MetaMagic! *Phase Dash into your draw pile.

pilot:CoverFire.NAME: Cover Fire
pilot:CoverFire.DESCRIPTION: pilot:Armament. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak.

pilot:Shield.NAME: Shield
pilot:Shield.DESCRIPTION: pilot:Armament. NL Gain !pilot:MetaMagic! pilot:Shields. NL Gain !M! pilot:Protect.

pilot:Rearm.NAME: Rearm
pilot:Rearm.DESCRIPTION: pilot:Armament. NL Shuffle !M! pilot:Armaments from your exhaust pile into your Titan.

pilot:Slide.NAME: Slide
pilot:Slide.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Gain 1 pilot:Momentum for each card played this turn.

pilot:Throw.NAME: Throw
pilot:Throw.DESCRIPTION: pilot:Armament. NL Gain !M! pilot:Momentum. NL Draw !pilot:MetaMagic! card.
pilot:Throw.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: pilot:Armament. NL Gain !M! pilot:Momentum. NL Draw !pilot:MetaMagic! cards.

pilot:SmokeBomb.NAME: Smoke Bomb
pilot:SmokeBomb.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Fill your hand with *Dazed.
pilot:SmokeBomb.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Fill your hand with *Dazed.

pilot:Rush.NAME: Rush
pilot:Rush.DESCRIPTION: Discard !M! card. NL Add 1 Mastiff to your hand.

pilot:Mastiff.NAME: Mastiff
pilot:Mastiff.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage and gain !M! Momentum. NL Advantage: Double the damage dealt.
